name: 2022 8th International Conference on e-Society, e-Learning and e-Technologies
content: Publicationï¼š The accepted paper will be included into ICSLT 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in Online Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
